newsitem.title: UK: NWE jet fuel barge premiums talked softer.
newsitem.headline: NWE jet fuel barge premiums talked softer.

text.p: NWE jet fuel barge premiums were talked slightly softer but cargoes were unchanged in inactive business on Thursday, traders said.
Traders said congestion in the ARA barge market due to the record high November IPE gas oil delivery was slowing jet fuel trade.

Prices sagged in sympathy with Dec IPE futures, which slid $3.25 to Dec IPE +$220.50. Traders saw barges offered at Dec IPE +$29 and bid at +$28, slightly softer. Cargoes were assessed at Dec +$30/31. In the Med, traders again saw EU-qualified material at cif high quotes +$6.
